title: High MS every game and i know its not my internet being slow
body:
this started happening last patch every game i play is high MS 230-280 every game even if i restart my internet please someone help 
even other people in my game get high ms every game is the server that bad for NA?

replies.body: still lagging every game i contacted support and they still have gotten back to me. ive tried everything i found on the internet and still lagging

Large changes in latency are generally influenced by ISP routing to the server. While we may need to look at some routing logs to see what's going on, I recommend ensuring your network settings are aligned with our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).

Let me know if you still have issues after taking those steps.
nothing helped this is pissing me off. i know for a fact its not my internet idk if it could be ports or firewall but i checked firewall and league is alowed im just lost
well,if you are using wifi,then try cable,then play LOL at diffrent times of day.Hope this solve your question
its not on wifi its hard wired into my computer and ima try changing out ethernet cords see if that helps. but i doubt it will cause i dont lag on any other game just LoL

Do you use any GPN(game private network)?Try WTFast,it has free for 7 days.

And remember to turn off the router wifi function,then goto task manager process,shut down anything that are irrelevant(don't close any vital processes).
Now try again.if still lagging,go to some place where there's better wifi.Sorry I don't know much.
just switched out cords and restarted router still lagging :(
